name: Espresso
description: A concentrated form of coffee brewed by forcing pressurized hot water through finely ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: A coffee drink that is composed of double espresso and equal parts of steamed milk and milk foam.

name: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a small amount of milk foam.

name: Americano
description: A diluted form of espresso made by adding hot water to it.

name: Mocha
description: A coffee drink made with espresso, chocolate, steamed milk, and topped with whipped cream.
